Key Match Events: Memphis had taken the lead to 13 early in the fourth, its biggest of the game at that point, but Dallas began relying on 3-pointers to get within five points near the seven-minute mark. Memphis went on a 10-2 run to take the lead back to 13 with 2:12 left.
Pre-Game Insights: The Mavericks were missing their top two scorers Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving due to injuries.
Post-Match Reflections: The article does not contain any post-match reflections.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article mentions that Memphis won for the 10th time in the last 11 home games.
Others: The article mentions that Dallas lost Daniel Gafford to a left ankle sprain in the second quarter.
